The IBM MessageSight log rotation configurations can be viewed by using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver show LogConfig help imaserver show LogConfig "Name=value"
EXAMPLE: imaserver show LogConfig "Name=imaserver-connection.log"
